prompt:
Generate Markdown code according to the following requirements:Horizontal Rule: The document starts with a horizontal rule, created using three hyphens (---).
Front Matter (YAML): Following the horizontal rule is a block of YAML front matter. YAML front matter is used to specify metadata for the document. In this context, it likely configures the settings or properties for an issue template on a platform like GitHub. The front matter is enclosed between two horizontal rule markers (---) at the start and end. It includes:
name: Specifies the name of the template, set to "漏洞反馈" (translated as "Bug Feedback").
about: Provides a description of the template's purpose, "报错或漏洞请使用这个模板创建" (translated as "Please use this template to report errors or bugs").
title: Sets a default title for issues created with this template, prefixed with "[BUG]".
labels: Assigns a default label, 'bug', to the issue.
assignees: Leaves the assignees field empty, indicating no default assignee is set.
Horizontal Rule: The document ends with another horizontal rule, identical to the one at the start, marking the end of the YAML front matter.
